ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/InstabugSample.xcworkspace -scheme InstabugSample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 13 Pro Max

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/InstabugSample.xcworkspace -scheme InstabugSample -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
